transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+3% Ally Team Effectiveness
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+3% Ally Team Effectiveness
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Code Khepri
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Reduces Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, then attacks the enemy.
Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to reduce Priority of the target by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
Increases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.
The caster cannot be defeated by Health reduced from using this skill.
description:
Reduces Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000069_1_1]</color>, then attacks the enemy.
Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000069_1_3]</color> chance to reduce Priority of the target by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000069_1_3]</color>.
Increases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.
The caster cannot be defeated by Health reduced from using this skill.

SKT_SECOND.name: Code Medjed
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
Reduces Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, then attacks all enemies.
Reduces Priority of the target by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
Increases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.
The caster cannot be defeated by Health reduced from using this skill.
description:
Reduces Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000069_1_1]</color>, then attacks all enemies.
Reduces Priority of the target by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000069_2_1]</color>.
Increases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.
The caster cannot be defeated by Health reduced from using this skill.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Code Anubis
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies, and grants Immortality to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nAdditionally, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict Stunned on the enemy for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, or for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> when the enemy is granted Invulnerability.\nIncreases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.
description: Attacks all enemies, and grants Immortality to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000069_3_1] turn(s)</color>.\nAdditionally, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000069_3_2]</color> chance to inflict Stunned on the enemy for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000069_3_2] turn(s)</color>, or for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000069_3_3] turn(s)</color> when the enemy is granted Invulnerability.\nIncreases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals fixed damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the target's Max Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the target by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals fixed damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000069_chain_1_1]</color> of the target's Max Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000069_backup_1_1]</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the target by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000069_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
